metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18384 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Info-ZIP UnZip 6.0 has a buffer overflow in list.c, when a ZIP archive has a crafted relationship between the compressed-size value and the uncompressed-size value, because a buffer size is 10 and is supposed to be 12.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Debian fixed this with the 07-increase-size-of-cfactorstr patch in 6.0-11 to fix debian bug #741384

criterions.comment: unzip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
